cause.description:
i think its pretty self explanatory.
just save the fucking whales.
1. Whales are people too.
2. Whale hunting must end immediately.
3. Whale fisherman havent gotten laid in years.
4. Samantha Cunningham will swim with a whale if we raise enough money to keep them around until hell freezes over.
5. Beached Whales have a higher risk at become crack heads.
cause.name: Fucking Save the Whales
